    • Method Detail

      • getContentType

        public Optional<org.apache.http.entity.ContentType> getContentType()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Gets the value of the Content-type header that was returned by the server. This same value is also available as part of the headers returned by the Response.getHeaders() methods.
        Specified by:
        getContentType in interface Response
        Returns:
        The value of the Content-type header in this HTTP response. If there's no Content-type header, an empty Optional is returned.

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Gets the HTTP status code in this response. This is an integer value as described on this page.
        Specified by:
        getStatusCode in interface Response
        Returns:
        The HTTP status code

        Description copied from interface: Response

        Specified by:

      • getHeaders

        public Collection<ApiHeader> getHeaders()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Returns the collection of HTTP header key-value pairs in this response. This method will always return a non-null collection which could possibly be empty if no headers were returned by the server.
        Specified by:
        getHeaders in interface Response
        Returns:
        The collection of HTTP headers

      • getBody

        public InputStream getBody()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Gets the response's body, ready for reading. The input stream returned by this method will always be positioned at the start of the response body and each different invocation of this method will return a new, independent instance of the body input stream.
        Specified by:
        getBody in interface Response
        Returns:
        The body content sent by the remote end during this HTTP call
